Let <math display="inline">m, n \in \mathbb{Z}</math>, we say that <math display="inline">m</math> divides <math display="inline">n</math> and write <math display="inline">m \mid n</math> when there exists <math display="inline">k \in \mathbb{Z}</math> such that <math display="block">n = k m</math>
